name: HEARTH ~ Botanical Perfume oil
description:
Hearth Opens with the Sunday morning nostalgia of freshly split wood, Balsam Fir needles being crushed for the tinder bundle, and the welcoming warmth of Oakmoss and bark. 

Mingling in the heart notes are inviting and homey swirls of flower nectar, spicy woods, and sun-warmed pine resin, reminiscent of evenings by the wood stove sipping homemade jasmine tea in your favorite blanket. Your cozy wool sweater still holds a little bit of campfire smoke and tangled leaves. Warm leather boots settle at the hearth for a night of rest, old bricks display the ceramic decor and still pine cones, and the unsmoked pipe tobacco adorns the mantle - a little offered to the fire for good measure. In the mudroom hangs a favorite handmade bridle and a newly crafted quiver. 

A classic drydown of Bourbon Vanilla laced with a hint of musk, birch, and juniper kindling bring the wearer back to center, held in a reassuring Autumn embrace.

HEARTH to me is the smell of home. The smell of all that centers around the tending of a wood stove.

The notes combine into one beautiful wreath of perfume casting a protective spell upon the wearer. No one note is overly pronounced, this perfume is subtly complex, steady and loyal, and will adapt and shift with your moods, body temperature, and pheromones.

{1/8 oz amber vial. Pure perfume strength oil}

patch test before wearing. please read policies before purchase.

name: ROSA RUGOSA petal elixir
description:
Carefully hand gathered in the peak of blossoming at the edge of the ocean, these roses are fragrantly captured in honey and spirits. 

Taken by the drop or drizzle, roses are known to help soothe the heart, settle the nerves, and restore emotional hope. 

Perfect for so many occasions, Rose is an indispensable, versatile, and luscious plant ally to have on hand. 

{1 ounce amber glass bottle}

name: PRECIOUS BEAUTY OIL ~ Rose, Sandalwood, Calendula, Red Tea
description:
Precious Botanical Oil elixir for deep skin nourishment, free radical fighting power, and supple skin balance. 

Gorgeously fragrant with precious & rare oils renowned for helping to maintain cellular integrity as well as adorn the senses with elegant floral beauty. 

To Use:
Apply generously to clean dry skin once or more daily as desired.
Breathe deeply.


Contains~ Extra virgin olive oil infused with fresh 
Hypericum and Calendula blossoms, Golden Jojoba wax, Apricot Kernel Oil, Tamanu oil, Argan Oil, Vitamin E oil, Benzoin oleoresin, pure plant essences of Myrrh, Sandalwood NC, Calendula,  Rooibos Tea, Elderflower,  Bulgarian Rose otto. 

Handcrafted. 100% natural

{1/2 oz glass bottle with roll on applicator}

name: INCENSE & EMBERS ~ Smoldering Jasmine Perfume Solid
description:
Incense & Embers is a dramatic coupling of heady, exotic Jasmine Sambac and dark, bewitching birch smoke. 

Evocative of sacred temples of drenched in blooming jasmine, freshly burning birch logs, and rich smoldering kyphi, this perfume is the perfect spectrum of divine feminine & divine masculine. Warm and sensual, deep and hypnotic, a little touch on the pulse points will adorn you with a gorgeous aromatic jasmine incense. Just strong enough to feel lavish, just gentle enough to leave you wanting more. 

Comforting, alluring, and perfect for layering or on its own.

Scent Notes: Floral Jasmine Sambac, Narcotic, Smokey, Dark, Incense, Inviting, Warm, Sensual, Fireplace, India, Autumn.  

Created originally for the Aromatic Muse membership, November 2013. Pairs perfectly with HEARTH perfume oil. 

{1/6 oz amber glass pot}

name: MEAD ~ Botanical Perfume for the Hopeless Romantic
description:
~ MEAD ~


2013 Edition 


Botanical Perfume  

by

Amrita Aromatics

~~~~~~


Made during the June SuperMoon & Summer Solstice 


~ Harmony of Love, Lust, Relationship, and Devotion ~ 


Ideal for Handfasting, Honeymoons, Commitment Ceremonies, Love Rituals, Sacred Intimacy, and Divine Romantic Interludes 


~~~~~~~~ 


Honey and wine, candied flowers, sweet forest resin, sparkling libation, humid summer dusk, roses on the wind, beeswax and herbs …….


These might be the notions that cross your mind when you first inhale. You may want to put your finger on the notes or plants, but instead be swept away by amorous fantasies of kissing under the moonlight, long dances under the jasmine-laced trellis, gazing into your lover’s eyes, or nostalgic memories of your favorite love sonnet. 


Mead is a poetic botanical perfume oil. 


Anoint your warm skin with the sweetness of a sparkling apple-rose mead, swirling with sensual appley notes of Davana, the elegant maturity and depth of Vanilla, and the femininity of grape flowers. Amber, Rose-Tobacco floral accord, and Somalia Frankincense give voluptuous body and hold to the blend


An aromatic libation, this blend is the perfect offering for a lovers’ rite, wedding gift, or hopeless romantic.   


 
Aromatic Notes: Bourbon Vanilla, Honey, Floral, Artemisia, Apple, Champagne, Sweet resins.


100% botanical essences in a base of jojoba oil.


{5 ml glass roll-on bottle with gold cap}

name: CHANDRA ~ Botanical Lunar Perfume
description:
CHANDRA

A Botanical Lunar Perfume Oil

2013

~~~~~~~

Jasmine ~ Tulsi ~ Palo Santo ~ 
 

Spicy-Sweet Tulsi (Holy Basil) with gorgeous, voluptuous Jasmine grandiflorum is a match made in heaven. Truly sensual and addictively delicious, this aromatherapy grade perfume is just the right strength for frequent use without being overpowering.

Tulsi opens creativity, expands consciousness, and warms the digestion and circulation. Tulsi and Jasmine both open and protect the heart chakra, making healthy, co-creative intimacy a welcome experience. Chandra perfume is ideal for prosperity work, creative endeavors, intimacy, womb healing, anointing in sacred circles, Moon ritual, and daily delicious wear.

Supporting oils of sacred Palo Santo wood and Sandalwood deepen the fragrance and add powerful spiritual protection. Contains additional proprietary blends of pure plant essential oils and absolutes.  

{5ml glass bottle}

 
~~~

"Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth." -Buddah

name: VINTAGE VIOLET ~ Violet & Tobacco Solid
description:
Vintage Violet 
 
~ accessory perfume solid ~
 
a Violet - Tobacco Fougere
 
LIMITED EDITION
~~~~
An Aromatic Muse creation. October 2013. Made to accompany SIMZA Gypsy perfume oil
 
With a dry and grassy punctuation this balm creates additional dimension; Perfect alone as a green, sophisticated fougere, together with Simza for a layered and dynamic affect, or as a base/heart note perfume enhancer balm for you favorite blends. It will act as a skin soother if you are sensitive, (place on skin before adding your liquid perfume), and as a helpful fixative for lighter, more diffusive perfumes. Play.
 
A simple yet unique balm ~ Warm, dry, grassy Violet leaf held in a whispering veil of jammy Tobacco, opening hints of Lavender absolute, captured in pure beeswax, golden jojoba, and vitamin e oil.
 
Apply to pulse points and allow the warmth of your skin to release the natural scent. 
 
{ 1/4 oz tin wrapped in red foil }
 
Ingredients: Jojoba oil, Beeswax, Pure essential oils, absolutes, and Co2 extracts. Patch test before wearing if you have sensitive skin.

name: SIMZA ~ Ltd Ed ~ A Rebellious Traditional ~ Gypsy Perfume Oil
description:
Simza perfume opens with a ravishing, crisp yet bold rose accord which stays put for a long courting. Slowly but surely, the perfume begins blossoming (with a citrus curl) on the skin in a sweet floral cadenza with a hint of honeybush tea.
 
Tenacious and deeply sensual, Simza falls head over heals into a Patchouli - Labdanum based root with a quietly supportive Sandalwood, creamy Orris, and hidden strengths of Frankincense, Styrax, Balsams, Lily-Ylang, Bergamot, Coffee, and Black Pepper. Irresistible.
 
If you selected a second, late night application, you will find in the morning your scarves and sleeves still humming with the last sweet notes of the slightly cocoa, slightly earthy drydown.
 
Built primarily on the infamous pairing of Bulgarian Rose and aged Dark Patchouli, this classic yet daring perfume explores compatible and accentuating aromatics that bring mature complexity and unapologetic emotion. Simza is both mysterious and voluptuous. Perfect for a first date as well as an 18 year anniversary. ;)
 
This listing is for a 6 ml decorative glass bottle with plastic dauber insert.

name: VICTORIALAND ~ Perfume Solid in Ornate Brass Comapct
description:
Victorialand

Botanical Perfume Solid

by

Amrita Aromatics, 2013

Created during the June Full Moon, Summer Solstice

~~~~

Sultry, Earthy, Gentle Dark Musky Floral, Whispering Spice

~~~~~~

Made for the moments of wishes and longing in the midnight hour - when the veil is thin and our resistance to truth melts. The moon and sun are strong and balanced. Our Intentions are cast, memories honored, desires nourished, and energy is cultivated in the lower chakras in support of the higher chakras.

A teasingly beautiful authentic perfume solid made of animalic, lusty nature -  a posture of self worth, intuitive knowing, magnetic attraction, sensuality, and personal reclamation.

Infused with many songs by the Cocteau Twins, hence the name "Victorialand". Of particular influence, the song Donimo.

Victorialand is distinct but gentle - perfect for those of you with synthetic fragrance sensitivity.

-----

~Made with pure essential oils, exotic absolutes, beeswax and floral waxes. Contains coconut oil (infused with rose petals).

~Notes - Musk, Ylang Ylang, Patchouli, Jasmine Sambac, Tuberose, hints of spice, Spikenard, Rose petals.

~Tenacity: Rich and penetrating, but decidedly subtle and not overwhelming. Lingers softly.

~Elegant Floral Design Brass Compact with removable tray insert, made in USA. Holds approximately 1/4 oz perfume solid.

~To wear: Apply to wrists and pulse points. The warmth of your skin will release the fragrance and nuances as it unfolds.

name: KISSY FIT ~ Artisan Lip Butter Trio
description:
Botanical Lip Balm Trio



(for the undecided lip balm lover)

or a delicious gift!

~~~~~~

This Trio includes one of each:



Crushed Rubies Lip & Cheek Glow

Smoked Coffee Kiss

Jasmine ~ Tulsi lip tingle



Crushed Rubies - A natural sheer rouge balm with a gorgeous vedic spice blend that refreshes and comforts. My most popular lip balm to date.

Smoked Coffee Kiss - A nostalgic, unisex lip balm that is unique, nourishing, and a little bit edgy. Made with lapsang souchong tea, coffee, and rich butters and oils. An Autumn favorite.

Jasmine ~ Tulsi lip tingle - A romantic and feminine pairing that makes magic tinlgy lips and lends a sensual floral layer. Costly, glamorous Jasmine Grandiflorum is used - a sweeter, more sophisticated Jasmine (as opposed to very heady J. Sambac).

*Ingredients are not listed on the tubes. If complete ingredients are needed, please email*

name: NEROLI & HONEYBUSH ~ Intensive Beauty Elixirs
description:
~Honeybush Neroli~

Intensive Beauty Elixir Oils for Face & Neck

Highlighting: Neroli, Red Tea, Argan, Tamanu, Hypericum, Sandalwood, Calendula, and Helychrism, among other antioxidant ingredients in a lush emollient base.

 

Neroli Dawn: Restorative and renewing, Neroli Dawn is meant as a morning treatment oil. Antiinflammatory, nutritive, and easily absorbed, Neroli Dawn goes well under cream, makeup, or purely solo. Packed with full strength herbs and oil including Tamanu, Hypericum Co2 extract, Red Tea and French Neroli.

 

Ingredients: Organic Honeybush tea infused in oils of Grapeseed, Apricot Kernel, and Sweet Almond, Hazelnut oil, St. Johnswort infused extra virgin olive oil, Tamanu oil, Vitamin E oil, Rooibos tea absolute, Orange blossom absolute, Pure essential oils of Roman Chamomile, Rosewood, Turkish Rose, French Neroli, and Co2 extract of Hypericum. 

 

Neroli Dusk: Emollient and protective, Neroli Dusk penetrates deeply into all layers of the skin and maintains suppleness, cell integrity, and repairs damage while you sleep. Excellent for minor scar tissue and stubborn acne. A spectrum of free radical fighters and nourishment including Argan oil, Red Tea, French Neroli, Sandalwood, Calendula Co2 extract, and renowned Helichrysm essential oil.

 

Ingredients: Organic Honeybush tea infused in oils of Grapeseed, Apricot Kernel, and Sweet Almond, Avocado oil, Poplar bud infused jojoba oil, Argan oil, Vitamin E oil, Rooibos tea absolute, Orange blossom absolute, Pure essential oils of Frankincense, Vetiver, Sandalwood, Helichrysm, Rosewood, Turkish Rose, French Neroli, and Co2 extract of Calendula. 

{one each, 1/3 oz glass roll-on bottle} 

Apply to clean skin as desired. Take care not to get water inside the bottle via the roll on applicator.
